display.title: Large Combustion
description: The &&3Large Combustion Engine&&r is a multiblock that can burn &&dCombustion Fuels&&r for even... more... power generation!
By default, this puppy outputs 2048 EU/t, which is equivalent to 4 &&3Turbo Combustion Generators&&r.

This might not convince you, but unlike the singleblock generators, you can actually &&6boost this&&r by providing &&aOxygen&&r. This will &&cdouble&&r the fuel consumption, but &&atriple&&r the power generation. This'll output 6144 EU/t with &&6150% Fuel efficiency&&r.
You'll also need to supply a small amount of &&aLubricant&&r to the LCE during operation - nothing too crazy.
The &&3LCE&&r is also void-free, unlike Large Turbines. Any energy that cannot be output will momentarily pause the multiblock.
To harness the cataclysmic power of the 6144 EU/t output, you'll need a &&34A EV Dynamo Hatch&&r or an &&3IV Dynamo Hatch&&r.
